experience.title: My professional experience
experience.eqtek.description: Developing and maintaining case management system platform. Desigining and implementing short-term tailored projects for multiple clients from the British public sector and banking. Line management for a team of around ten devs and QAs, supporting communication with business and helping improving software development process.
experience.vsoft.description: Maintaining web application used by sales representatives to evaluate complex insurance configurations.
experience.flightscope.pm-description: Evaluating, planning and designing architecture for multiple software projects.{br}Coordinating communication between offices (Poland, South Africa and USA) and synchronizing co-operation of teams (project owners, UI designers, engineers, etc.).{br}Prioritizing tasks and projects in regard to the available resources and the market demand.{br}Managing a few small software teams on all levels.
experience.flightscope.leader-descriptio: I kept the previous duties. On top of that, I started designing software architecture, planning project development and overseeing the process, as well as managing a team of a few developers.
experience.flightscope.dev-description: Developing and maintaining applications used by golfers (both professional and amateur) to improve their skills by analysing ball flight data provided by multiple sport radars.
education.title: My education
education.masters-desc: A diploma thesis on the subject "System for decoding Morse code with the use of software-defined radio" realized in the form of an application that performs real-time digital audio signal processing, written in C ++.
hobby.title: After work
hobby.brewing-description: Brewing your own beer might seem as a complicating and demanding task. And that's exactly how it is... After a several dozen of batches, I still feel I barely starting exploring the hoppy world.{br}{br}Regardless of results, I love experimenting with beer styles - planning, mashing and seeing to fermentation. It's not the same with sticking labels or cleaning the kitchen afterwards. But no pain, no gain...{br}{br}Progress of my brewer's adventure can be followed on my brewery's website:{br}{br}{wawrzelniaLink}
hobby.squash-description: To remain healthy, both physically and mentally, I simply must sweat a bit, from time to time.{br}{br}I'm definitely not one of those, who can set their own challenges by going further or faster. I need an demanding opponent of flesh and blood on the other side of the court. Sometimes I win and sometimes I loose, but the most important part is this thrill between the first and last ball of the match.
hobby.traveling-description: I won't be the first one to say it, but I love to travel. The further and more exotic my destination is - the better. And it's not only about the sights and architecture. I really enjoy observing peculiarities of all the different places and cultures.{br}{br}And the most interesting are... markets. It's always the regular food shop, where you can clearly see the differences between countries - by the taste, scent and likes of the natives.
contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: Do you find my profile interesting?{br}You think I would perfectly fit in your team?{br}Contact me! Include a bit of details, and send!{br}I'll respond in no time.
